text: Va kasonero, ki nifoq varzidand [niz] ma'lum dorad, ki [cun] ʙa eson gufta sud: "Bijoed, dar rohi Alloh taolo ʙicanged jo [az xonavoda va qaʙilaaton] difo' kuned". Guftand: "Agar medonistem, cange ruj xohad dod, hatman, az sumo pajravi mekardem". Onon dar on hangom ʙa kufr nazdiktar ʙudand to imon; ʙa zaʙoni xes cize megujand, ki dar dilhojason nest va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci [dar dil] pinhon mekunand, ogohtar ast
